title: 05/21/2021 - HOUR 1 - Nets, Clippers, LeBron, Tebow
itunes:title: 05/21/2021 - HOUR 1 - Nets, Clippers, LeBron, Tebow
description:
We haven't seen the Nets under pressure yet

The Clippers may reboot everything if they underachieve again in the playoffs

People are exaggerating LeBron James' ankle injury

Tim Tebow fans will be irrational if Trevor Lawrence struggles early


Guest: Ric Bucher

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
